plot: Joel and Angelique are best friends. William & Joanne have broken up. Joel's secret crush on Angelique now stands at the crossroads of their friendship & future. William also faces the test of love as he tries to win Joanne back.
title: A French Kiss
plot_es: Joel and Angelique are best friends. William & Joanne have broken up. Joel's secret crush on Angelique now stands at the crossroads of their friendship & future. William also faces the test of love as he tries to win Joanne back.
plot_en: Joel and Angelique are best friends. William & Joanne have broken up. Joel's secret crush on Angelique now stands at the crossroads of their friendship & future. William also faces the test of love as he tries to win Joanne back.
